sel.event.world.world



interface WorldEvent: sel.event.event.Event;
Generic event related to the world.

abstract pure nothrow @nogc @property @safe World world();
Gets the world where the event has happened.

class StartRainEvent: sel.event.world.world.WorldEvent, sel.event.event.Cancellable;
alias StartSnowEvent = StartRainEvent;
Called it starts to rain or snow in the world.

pure nothrow @nogc @property @safe tick_t duration();
Gets the duration of the precipitations is ticks.

pure nothrow @nogc @property @safe tick_t duration(tick_t duration);
Sets the duration of the precipitation in ticks.

Example:
event.duration = 1;


class StopRainEvent: sel.event.world.world.WorldEvent;
alias StopSnowEvent = StopRainEvent;
Event called when it stops to rain or snow in the world.

class LightningStrikeEvent: sel.event.world.world.WorldEvent, sel.event.event.Cancellable;
Event called when a lighting strikes in the world.

pure nothrow @nogc @property @safe EntityPosition position();
Gets the position where the lightning has struck.

pure nothrow @nogc @property @safe Entity target();
Gets the target of the lightning, it may be null if the lightning struck randomly.
